title: Mango-Moves
description: A dog inspired browser game that I developed just one week after learning Javascript. My dog, Mango, loves to go to the beach. The user must take her there. To get there, Mango needs to avoid obstacles and score points. The game ends if Mango runs into an obstacle. To win and reach the beach, Mango needs to get 250 points.

title: Football Fan Experience
description: A full stack MERN application. This application is geared toward NFL fans. Fans will be able to fill out stadium review forms and view previous reviews on all/any NFL stadium.
